title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1467/77 of 30 June 1977 amending Regulation (EEC) No 394/70 on detailed rules for granting export refunds on sugar
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1467/77  of 30 June 1977  amending Regulation (EEC) No 394/70 on detailed rules for granting export refunds on sugar
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
An Article 12a as follows is added to Regulation (EEC) No 394/70:
"For the purposes of Articles 3 and 7 of Regulation (EEC) No 766/68 the export refund shall take account of the amount of the levy for storage costs as provided for in Article 8 (1) (a) of Regulation (EEC) No 3330/74 fixed for the sugar year in question."

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1977.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1977.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
